name: Code Integrity Blocked Driver Load
description: Detects driver load events that got blocked by Windows code integrity checks
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-CodeIntegrity\/Operational AND that\ did\ not\ meet\ the\ Microsoft\ signing\ level\ requirements)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-CodeIntegrity\/Operational AND that\ did\ not\ meet\ the\ Microsoft\ signing\ level\ requirements)`
